name: The Proto-Finnic Holy Roman Khaganate
startIntroPart1: You are Khagan Spurdo Spärde of the Proto-Finnic Holy Roman Khaganate.
startIntroPart2: From the ancient forests of the North, our empire rises to reclaim what is rightfully ours.
declaringWar: The songs of war echo through the tundra! Your end begins now!
attacked: You dare challenge the might of the Khaganate? Fools!
defeated: This is but a temporary frost. The Khaganate shall endure beyond the stars.
introduction: We are the guardians of the North, the eternal Khaganate. Do not squander this audience.
neutralHello: Greetings from the frozen halls of our empire.
neutralNo: That does not align with our ambitions.
hateNo: That is an affront to the Khagan!
hateYes: Fine, if only to further our cause.
afterPeace: A pause in the storm is wise. But the frost always returns.
tradeRequest: You are fortunate the Khaganate considers this proposal worthy of discussion.

name: The Great Hwan Empire
startIntroPart1: The Great Hwan Empire extends its dominance over all that lies before us.
startIntroPart2: Bow before the inevitable march of history, for the Hwan shall prevail!
declaringWar: You dare oppose the might of the Hwan Empire? Prepare to be annihilated!
attacked: Foolish aggression will be met with overwhelming retaliation!
defeated: This setback is but a momentary pause in the Hwan Empire's eternal ascendancy.
introduction: I am Kim Il Sung, Emperor of the Hwan Empire. History bends to my will, and so shall you.
neutralHello: What business do you bring before the Empire?
hateHello: What insolence compels you to speak to me?
hateLetsHearIt: Speak, before my patience runs out.
hateNo: The Hwan Empire rejects this outright.
You insult us with this proposal.
hateYes: The Empire will tolerate this for now.
Do not mistake this for favor.
afterPeace: The Emperor grants you this limited peace. Use your time well.
tradeRequest: The great Kim Il-Sung deems this trade favorable, accept.
